column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque popped my BBQ cherry.  I had had a little experience with BBQ before Smoque
column2: but I'm offically a BBQ brat now.  I mean if this is your first REAL BBQ experience
column3: what the hell can POSSIBLY stand up to it?  The brisket is so good
column4: I'm literally drooling thinking about it.  The staff here is great too.  One of my first times here we were asked to move for a larger party
column5: and gladly did so.  One of the staff gave us free food (Sausage
column6: that was pretty damn good though I'd never order it with the brisket on the menu!) for being so courteous!  A++!  You really don't find good service around very much any more
column7: but Smoque delivers on ALL fronts.  Come hungry
